    @allure.title("Test to verify the execution of a job with continue task recurrence and both verification enabled")
    @allure.description("This test is to verify the execution of a job with continue task recurrence and both "
                        "verification enabled")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cvv7rey")
    @pytest.mark.scenario
    @pytest.mark.job
    @pytest.mark.task_recurrence_execution
    @pytest.mark.test_job_execution_with_continuing_task_recurrence_and_both_verification_enabled
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("job_execution_by, users_list", [
        ("user", [Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_01"), Env.get_env_data("QA_ADMIN_USERNAME_01")]),
        ("user_group", [])])
    def test_job_execution_with_continuing_task_recurrence_and_both_verification_enabled(self, user_group_creation,
                                                                                         job_execution_by, users_list):
        process_data = self.recurrence_obj.test_adding_parameters_with_both_verification_and_publish_prototype_with_recurrence()
        login(Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_01"), Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_PASSWORD_01"))
        select_facility(const.FACILITY_NAME)
        select_usecase(const.USECASE_NAME)
        self.job_obj.assign_user_and_user_group_to_process(job_execution_by, users_list, user_group_creation,
                                                           all_task_assignmnet=True)
        self.job_obj.create_job()
        self.job_obj.start_job()
        self.job_obj.start_task(task_name_01, recurrence=True)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["single_line_param"], data={"value": "qwerty"})
        self.job_obj.verify_self(task_name_01, process_data["single_line_param"])
        validate_credentials_for_sign_off(encode_string(Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_PASSWORD_01")))
        self.job_obj.accept_self(task_name_01, process_data["single_line_param"])
        self.job_obj.assign_peer(task_name_01, process_data["single_line_param"], username=users_list,
                                 job_execution_by=job_execution_by)
    
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["multi_line_param"], data={"value": "qwerty"})
        self.job_obj.verify_self(task_name_01, process_data["multi_line_param"])
        validate_credentials_for_sign_off(encode_string(Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_PASSWORD_01")))
        self.job_obj.accept_self(task_name_01, process_data["multi_line_param"])
        self.job_obj.assign_peer(task_name_01, process_data["multi_line_param"], username=users_list,
                                 job_execution_by=job_execution_by)
    
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["single_select_param"], data={"value": "monday"})
        self.job_obj.verify_self(task_name_01, process_data["single_select_param"])
        validate_credentials_for_sign_off(encode_string(Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_PASSWORD_01")))
        self.job_obj.accept_self(task_name_01, process_data["single_select_param"])
        self.job_obj.assign_peer(task_name_01, process_data["single_select_param"], username=users_list,
                                 job_execution_by=job_execution_by)
    
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["multi_select_param"],
                                       data={"value": ["gold", "silver"]})
        self.job_obj.verify_self(task_name_01, process_data["multi_select_param"])
        validate_credentials_for_sign_off(encode_string(Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_PASSWORD_01")))
        self.job_obj.accept_self(task_name_01, process_data["multi_select_param"])
        self.job_obj.assign_peer(task_name_01, process_data["multi_select_param"], username=users_list,
                                 job_execution_by=job_execution_by)
        logout()
    
        login(Env.get_env_data("QA_ADMIN_USERNAME_01"), Env.get_env_data("QA_ADMIN_PASSWORD_01"))
        select_facility(const.FACILITY_NAME)
        select_usecase(const.USECASE_NAME)
        self.job_obj.get_specific_job()
        validate_credentials_for_sign_off(encode_string(Env.get_env_data("QA_ADMIN_PASSWORD_01")))
        self.job_obj.accept_peer(task_name_01, process_data["single_line_param"])
    
        validate_credentials_for_sign_off(encode_string(Env.get_env_data("QA_ADMIN_PASSWORD_01")))
        self.job_obj.accept_peer(task_name_01, process_data["multi_line_param"])
    
        validate_credentials_for_sign_off(encode_string(Env.get_env_data("QA_ADMIN_PASSWORD_01")))
        self.job_obj.accept_peer(task_name_01, process_data["single_select_param"])
    
        validate_credentials_for_sign_off(encode_string(Env.get_env_data("QA_ADMIN_PASSWORD_01")))
        self.job_obj.accept_peer(task_name_01, process_data["multi_select_param"])
    
        logout()
    
        login(Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_01"), Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_PASSWORD_01"))
        select_facility(const.FACILITY_NAME)
        select_usecase(const.USECASE_NAME)
        self.job_obj.get_specific_job()
        self.job_obj.complete_task(task_name_01, recurrence=True, continue_recurrence=True)
    
        new_recurrence_data = self.job_obj.poll_stage_data(job_id=const.JOB_ID, stage_name=stage_name_01)
        self.job_obj.assert_task_execution_type(new_recurrence_data, 1, "RECURRING")
    
        self.job_obj.start_task(task_name_01, recurrence=True, recurrence_start_reason="Test_recurrence")
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["single_line_param"], data={"value": "qwerty"})

    def verify_self(self, task_name, parameter_name, job_id=None):
        if not job_id:
            job_id = const.JOB_ID
        stage, task, param_details, stage_index, task_index = self.get_stage_task_parameter_details_for_execution(
            task_name, parameter_name,
            job_id)
        parameter_response_id = param_details["response"][0]["id"]
        url = const.PARAMETER_VERIFICATIONS + const.PARAMETER_EXECUTIONS + const.SLASH + parameter_response_id + const.SELF_VERIFICATION + const.VERIFY
        response = Request.post(url, data=None, files=None)
        response_data = response.json()
